import React from 'react'; import ScrollToTop from 'react-scroll-up'; import { FiChevronUp } from "react-icons/fi"; import Helmet from "./component/common/Helmet"; import TextLoop from "react-text-loop"; import HeaderThree from "./component/header/HeaderThree"; import FooterTwo from "./component/footer/FooterTwo"; import TabTwo from "./elements/tab/TabTwo"; import ContactThree from "./elements/contact/ContactThree"; import PortfolioList from "./elements/portfolio/PortfolioList"; import ServiceList from "./elements/service/ServiceList"; import BlogContent from "./elements/blog/BlogContent"; import './index.scss'; const SlideList = [ { textPosition: 'text-left', category: 'Welcome to my World', description: '', buttonText: '', buttonLink: '' } ] const PortfolioLanding = () => { let title = 'About Me', description = "I am an ambitions Full Stack Developer with a long background of IT, a tech enthusiast, passionate photographer, and an eager learner. Pushing the world toward a new way of using technology to advise, benefit, and provide service to others is a motivator to learn more."; const PostList = BlogContent.slice(0 , 5); return (
{/* Start Slider Area */}
{/* Start Single Slide */} {SlideList.map((value , index) => (
{value.category ? {value.category} : ''}

Hi, I’m Kingsley
Developer. IT. Photographer. {" "}

based in Los Angeles.

{value.description ?

{value.description}

: ''} {value.buttonText ?
{value.buttonText}
: ''}
))} {/* End Single Slide */}
{/* End Slider Area */} {/* Start About Area */}

{title}

{description}

{/* End About Area */} {/* Start Service Area */} {/*

There are many variations of passages of Lorem Ipsum available, but the majority have suffered alteration.

*/} {/* End Service Area */} {/* Start Portfolio Area */}

but the majority have suffered alteration.

))}
*/} {/* End Blog Area */} {/* Start COntact Area */}
{/* End COntact Area */} {/* Start Back To Top */}
{/* End Back To Top */}
) } export default PortfolioLanding;
